entry.title: Combined summary - Git repo choices
entry.summary: The user is seeking clarification on the purpose of three different repositories related to Bitcoin. The first repository, identified as #1, is the current development tree, but the user notes that it may not always be reliable or usable. The second repository, #2, is a copy of some portion of #1 that has been discontinued around version 0.4.0. Its purpose is similar to the third repository, which is another copy of #1 intended for development along stable branches and making release cuts from the same.Releases made from #3 are then pulled back to #1 for keeping. However, the user expresses confusion about which repository is best suited for their needs, as the descriptions provided on each repository are minimal with the exception of #1.The user also notes that a certain function is not included in #1, causing further confusion. Despite this, the user seeks clarification on the intended use of the three repositories related to Bitcoin.
